A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Why would anyone pay a writer/director to end such an iconic character like Luke Skywalker in such an awful way? Peter Jackson might as well have had spider-man just show up and high five Frodo in the first movie then never show Frodo again. That would’ve been more explainable than what just happened to Luke. Don’t waste 3 hours of your life watching this garbage.
